resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.

fields.summary: VPC- VMs stuck in shutting down during load testing

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
This was tested on Shared setup #2  and the instance i-b5ba5c9d  is still was not terminated there. "An instance was marked "unhealthy"  by the auto scaling group and then was stuck in terminating state. The transition to "unhealthy" state was initiated by an ELB-induced instance churn (see EUCA-11399). The ELB was since deleted. 

Error seen in the log
{code}
[root@g-05-02 ~]# less /var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-output.log|grep i-b5ba5c9d
